IMAGE: http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/6995/assymcgeebv3.jpg

Description: The series revolves around the antics of Assy McGee, an ultra-violent and emotionally disturbed police detective who just happens to have no upper torso, head, or arms. With the help his partner Sanchez (and often against the wishes of his superior officers), Assy patrols the streets of Exeter, New Hampshire. Assy McGee is a walking, talking lower torso with exposed buttocks. Horribly violent and clinically depressed, Assy is a parody of the 1970s/1980s movie cops as seen in such films as Dirty Harry, Lethal Weapon and Cobra: trigger-happy, tough, at times hopelessly depressed, and in conflict with his fellow officers as often as he is in conflict with crime. Assy has a slurred style of speech similar to Sylvester Stallone, though it is far more muffled, possibly due to his anatomy or inebriation (or both). He also quotes and mimics some of Stallone's most memorable characters, shouting Judge Dredd's catch phrase "I am the law!" in episode five "Mexican Rain" and reenacts the Rocky training scene in episode seven "Ring of Fire". Sometimes, when out of breath, or even just peeved, Assy will flatulate.

WIKI: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Assy_mcgee
IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0795065/

Creators: Carl W. Adams, H. Jon Benjamin, Matt Harrigan.
Directors: Carl W. Adams, David SanAngelo.
Writers: Will Hayes, Carl W. Adams, Matt Harrigan, Patrick Borelli, H. Jon Benjamin.
Starring: Larry Murphy, H. Jon Benjamin, Carl W. Adams, Jen Cohn, Rachel Dratch, Patrick Borelli, George Lowe, Kurt Braunohler, Marty Johnson, Sam Seder.

[BLX Note: I uploaded season 1 of Assy McGee during Operation: Massive Information Leak, Wave One, long long ago.
